overview: The Mother Nature holds the ultimate truth and as such she provides us with abundance in every part of our existence. It’s the wisdom of nature that the lost man with a child turns to in order to overcome his problems, because it teaches him to adapt to the change. It’s the silence of a starry night that whispers the answers he seeks and the profound knowledge of trees that gives him courage. The whole world is our home. From our body where we move in when we are born, to everything on this planet we all live in. We are all connected, we are all one, therefore wherever love is our home is.
title: Where is home?
